reviews.text: Wonderful time with Ayla and Melissa and class. Enjoyed making Ayla's Fascinators.
Pretty unique
Had a great time on the haunted hayride.  Child friendly and the workers were great!
Clean use your GPS kind of out there
We had a great time at the haunted hayride! It was perfect for my sons, who are 6 & 8.
Great food
Never been there

Quaint non-chain inn.  Very welcoming staff.  We had a suite which included a large bedroom, bathroom and sitting room.  Bathroom had a nice stand-up shower and a tub.  Not overly fancy and certainly not sophisticated.  But very homey and clean.  We enjoyed having drinks in the bar and a nice meal from the restaurant.  American food predominantly featured on the menu.  We did not use the spa.  The weather was cold so we didn't get a chance to enjoy the outdoor areas.

This is the most charming place ever.  Rooms in the original building are beautiful with a historic decor.  Newer building in back with large very nice comfortable rooms.  Small tavern and restaurant in the main building with wonderful food and drinks.  Lots of historic memorabilia throughout.  Great getaway with the hot tubs nearby.  Highly recommened.
Great breakfast and dinner food at the restaurant. Accommodations were good. We stayed in the newer section. Quaint little town, maybe a bit past its prime as a tourist destination.

Great atmosphere and good food. The selection could be a little better for me, but everyone has a different taste. If you like a pub style restaurant this is a nice place.  Berkeley Springs Wv has a couple more nice places similar to the Country Inn.

Recently stayed here as part of a work event. The hotel is charming and has quite a bit of character. It was a bit of a different experience having an actual key to my room rather than a key card. All of the staff were helpful and friendly throughout our visit to Berkeley Springs.  

It is a convenient location to downtown shops and is directly beside the Berkeley Springs State Park, close by to the Castle, and a short drive to Cacapon State Park. 

I will say that the walls are rather thin, during our first night I could hearing my "neighbor" talking and his phone notifications - it was slightly annoying and could be very obnoxious if you were to get a really loud neighbor during your stay...

I will say that the walls are rather thin, during our first night I could hearing my "neighbor" talking and his phone notifications - it was slightly annoying and could be very obnoxious if you were to get a really loud neighbor during your stay...
Wonderful atmosphere, food presentation was amazing,  the thoughtfulness of flavor profiles even better. Perfectly cooked meats, clean flavors. Service was fantastic. Truly a gem.

We come here regularly for dinner and now brunch. The food is nothing short of phenomenal. Damien,Betsy and their staff is friendly and attentive ,it's our go-to spot. Nothing on the menu has ever fell short of amazing
Great food and service love the ambience.
Food service atmosphere. All Wonderful
A delightful eating experience. Food amazing. And Betsy, the owner was extremely warm & welcoming! We will recommend this restaurant to everyone.  And certainly will return!
Great view of the valley.
The view was amazing! You can literally see for miles! It would be breathtaking in the Fall.
It is a breath taking view
Beautiful overlook, but you cant choose who appears with you, some people are rude drinking smoking blaring music theowing litter over the edge...

Definitely a lovely view regardless of the season. The interpretive sign, though appreciated, touts the various organizations which have lauded the view as the 'Switzerland View of America,' etc. This is slightly laughable, even given the number of states (three) visible from this point. Perhaps this appellation was warranted in the 1700s. To be sure, though, still a lovely spot. Sad that the Panorama at the Peak restaurant has permanently closed.
Best bar around. Food drinks friends music fun
Met the owners.Both awesome people.Had an excellent cheeseburger and my girl said her NY strip was perfect.Can't wait to go back!!

Limited menu , but this place has great food,  great prices,  a fantastic atmosphere that makes you always feel welcome.  As a bar and grill,  I almost expect a cordial atmosphere,  but really,  it's more like s Cheers Bar, from tv.  I will always go back!
Quaint down to earth Jack, Jim and beer bar. Live music and dis for entertainment. A true country music must see.
Love this place. Visited for the first time 10 years ago. Went back tonight and the steaks, ambiance and staff were still amazing. Hidden jem.
